code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant U1 as User A (Infra_RedisCache)
    participant U2 as User B (Infra_LoadBalancer)
    participant SC as Smart Contracts
    participant R as Relayer
    participant CA as Chain A (Infra_RedisCache)
    participant CB as Chain B (Infra_IngressController)

    U1->>SC: 1. Create Swap
    SC->>CA: E1: Deploy Source Escrow
    CA->>CA: State: User Funds Locked (Infra_IngressController)
    
    U2->>SC: 2. Fulfill Swap
    SC->>CB: E2: Deploy Destination Escrow
    CB->>CB: State: Fulfiller Funds Locked (Infra_WorkerNode)
    
    R->>SC: 3. Set Fulfiller
    SC->>CA: State: Fulfiller Set
    
    U1->>R: 4. Submit Secret
    R->>CA: E3: Secret Revealed
    CA->>CA: State: Unlock with Secret
    R->>CB: E3: Secret Revealed
    CB->>CB: State: Unlock with Secret
    
    CA->>U1: 5. User A Gets Tokens
    CB->>U2: 5. User B Gets Tokens
    
    Note over CA,CB: Swap Completed Successfully
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 首先，我们需要定义流程的起点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我的意思是User A (Infra_RedisCache)应该这样理解...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我同意这个观点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 在User A (Infra_RedisCache)中，我们需要定义核心逻辑。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 这个系统主要由User B (Infra_LoadBalancer)、Smart Contracts组成。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我的意思是User B (Infra_LoadBalancer)、Smart Contracts应该这样理解...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 关于Chain A (Infra_RedisCache)、Chain B (Infra_IngressController)，你有什么想法？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 确认一下，Chain A (Infra_RedisCache)、Chain B (Infra_IngressController)是正确的吧？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们可以将1. Create Swap、E1: Deploy Source Escrow分为几个类型。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 让我澄清一下，1. Create Swap、E1: Deploy Source Escrow的作用是...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: State: User Funds Locked (Infra_IngressController)、2. Fulfill Swap主要包含以下几类。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 这个设计看起来不错。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们应该如何处理State: Fulfiller Funds Locked (Infra_WorkerNode)、3. Set Fulfiller？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 好的，那就按这个方案。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 最后，流程到达State: Fulfiller Funds Locked (Infra_WorkerNode)、3. Set Fulfiller结束。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我们应该如何处理State: Fulfiller Set、4. Submit Secret？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 让我澄清一下，State: Fulfiller Set、4. Submit Secret的作用是...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我们可以将State: Unlock with Secret、E3: Secret Revealed分为几个类型。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 这个设计看起来不错。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 关于5. User A Gets Tokens、5. User B Gets Tokens，你有什么想法？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 确认一下，5. User A Gets Tokens、5. User B Gets Tokens是正确的吧？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
